Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_n4rr55gmfQ1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/5b49ffebe3dc502d56af57aaa7c2cd32/tumblr_inline_n4rr6aEcH71rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><em>"Play like a sir,"</em> says <strong>Proot</strong>, creator of <a href="http://bit.ly/1nAr2v8"><strong>Renaissance Compilation</strong></a> - a collection of settings and configurations for some of the most popular mods in the community. It’s meant to take your vanilla KSP experience to the next level not as as a way to redistribute each mod that it works with.</p>

<p>Check the photo for more info its features. We also highly suggest you go check <a href="http://bit.ly/1nAr2v8"><strong>THIS POST</strong></a> with more artwork, video and even literature about it!</p>

Totally deserving of it!

The KSP community puts out so many great add-ons that they'll probably never be enough time to feature them all. (hint: Kerbal Aircraft Expansion for next week )

That's an awesome mod indeed. Congrats on the showcase, Proot!

Is it too resource intensive? My GameData folder is getting kinda crowded and I'm afraid to stick more stuff into it.

That's an awesome mod indeed. Congrats on the showcase, Proot!

Is it too resource intensive? My GameData folder is getting kinda crowded and I'm afraid to stick more stuff into it.

Yes, but totally worth it. Texture reduction? I'm running A LOT of mods (around 50 of them) and a few of them are parts packs (NP2 and KWR) with ATM, and I get crashes every now and then. Still, not that often and totally worth it!
You did it Proot! Your work is very great!

I saw it on tumblr this morning, but I could not respond until now.

Thank you to all community.

Thank you Squad for this amazing game, for so much fun during so much time.

Thank you for your style; for demonstrate that a small good group can do HUGE things.

Thank you for made me a kid again, in the best of senses: for the constant learning, the exploration, the joy and the surprise in each small detail.

Thank you for give us a small universe to each of us.

Thanks-to-you.

Btw, I'm uploading a new update with polar auroras and so on... hope you enjoy the new features.
I'd totally get this mod, but...

I saw it on tumblr this morning, but I could not respond until now.

Thank you to all community.

Thank you Squad for this amazing game, for so much fun during so much time.

Thank you for your style; for demonstrate that a small good group can do HUGE things.

Thank you for made me a kid again, in the best of senses: for the constant learning, the exploration, the joy and the surprise in each small detail.

Thank you for give us a small universe to each of us.

Thanks-to-you.

Btw, I'm uploading a new update with polar auroras and so on... hope you enjoy the new features.

Congrats! Keep up the good work!

Congrats! Keep up the good work!

Any of this would be possible without people like you, rbray89. Your work with mods like EVE or ATM is simply priceless and turns an amazing game like this in the most fun sandbox.
I run all of the mods already, except chatterer and soundtrack replacer. I tried BA, but I dunno, it just felt weird having a weird atmosphere "sphere" above it.
